# QuickFood Project Specifications

## Project Overview
QuickFood is a Flutter-based mobile application for food ordering. It has two main functions: restaurant side and customer side. Restaurant will be able to manage their menu and orders, while customers can browse, order, and track completions of their orders. It supports Android and iOS. The app uses Firebase for backend services including authentication, database, and real-time updates. There will be localization support for English and Czech.

## Coding Standards
- Follow the Dart style guide.
- Use PascalCase for class names and camelCase for variables and methods.
- Write clear and concise comments for all public methods.

## Dependencies
- Use following packages:
  - `provider` for state management
  - firebase_core, firebase_auth, cloud_firestore for backend services
